dcterms:description: RobotCar Seasons is a subset of the Oxford Robotcar Dataset, containing sequences of images captured during multiple traversals through the same route in different weather or seasonal conditions. Each traversal includes images from three cameras and provides ground truth pose information.
dcterms:title: RobotCar Seasons

dcterms:creator: W. Maddern
G. Pascoe
C. Linegar
P. Newman
dcterms:description: The Oxford RobotCar Dataset consists of a year-long collection of data from a car driving around Oxford, UK, capturing images and sensor data under various conditions.
dcterms:title: Oxford RobotCar Dataset
